archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1056
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Payments specialist, I want all payments received via Pronto to be allocated first time and automatically against the customer account so that limits the amount that falls in to suspense.

properties.value: Pronto integrates with Comarch system via files. Payments stored in file will be processed based on agreed rules. Barcodes, if not available then customer reference.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
